Models¶

core modules for pagetools

class pagetools.core.models.LangManager(*args, **kwargs)¶

Manager for models with a lang-field

lfilter(lang=False, **kwargs)¶

uses keyword-argument or system-language to add ‘lang’ to filter- arguments if settings.LANGUAGES compares to not null

class pagetools.core.models.LangModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model with ‘lang’-field To avoid “NOT NULL constraint failed” errors, empty lang is saved as “”

class pagetools.core.models.PagelikeModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

This may for everything that inclines a detail_view

class pagetools.core.models.PublishableLangManager(*args, **kwargs)¶

Manager that finds published content language filtered

class pagetools.core.models.PublishableLangModel(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model with model_utils...StatusModel for status and a language-field
